name: Jeremy
title: Professional actor
description: I always try to take something positive, even out of the worst things. And, in this case, it’s got to be this courage. The courage women have had to stand up, and not wallow or be taken hold of by all this awful news. They knew that they couldn’t start a crusade alone, but they built one anyway – one brick at a time. And that shows great strength – a strength that I see it as my place to encourage.
